execute_query: CREATE DATABASE if not exists Google_flights;
CREATE TABLE if not exists trips(id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, unique_id VARCHAR(50), date_of_scrape DATE, price INT);
CREATE TABLE if not exists airports (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, iata_code VARCHAR(50), name VARCHAR(100), city VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE if not exists facilities(id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, text VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE if not exists flights( id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, trip_id INT, depart_time TIME, depart_airport_id INT, arr_time TIME, arr_airport_id INT, flight_duration TIME, co2_emission VARCHAR(50), order_in_trip INT);
CREATE TABLE if not exists flight_facilities (flight_id INT, facility_id INT);
executemany_query: UPDATE airports SET name = %s WHERE iata_code = %s;
INSERT INTO flights (depart_airport_id, arr_airport_id, depart_time, arr_time, flight_duration, co2_emission, order_in_trip, trip_id) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s);
INSERT INTO trips (unique_id, date_of_scrape, price) VALUES (%s, %s, %s);
